scripts.automation: gulp build && npm run pm2Server & $(npm bin)/cypress run && npm run pm2ServerKill
scripts.automation:runner: gulp build && npm run pm2Server & $(npm bin)/cypress open && npm run pm2ServerKill
scripts.automation:alert: gulp build && npm run pm2Server & $(npm bin)/cypress run --config integrationFolder='./test/integration/specs/alert' && npm run pm2ServerKill
scripts.automation:notification: gulp build && npm run pm2Server & $(npm bin)/cypress run --config integrationFolder='./test/integration/specs/notification' && npm run pm2ServerKill
scripts.automation:ribbon: gulp build && npm run pm2Server & $(npm bin)/cypress run --config integrationFolder='./test/integration/specs/ribbon' && npm run pm2ServerKill
